title: News24.com | Covid-19: Inmate at Worcester prison tests positive
description: The Department of Correctional Services says the number of confirmed cases of the virus at prisons has increased to 111.
content:
The Worcester Correctional Centre in the Western Cape has become the second prison in South Africa where an inmate has tested positive for Covid-19.
In a statement on Monday, the Department of Correctional Services (DCS) said the number of confirmed cases of… [+1610 chars]
